Description.Text: There is an outdoor fresh water pool with a separate shallow pool section for children. The Sun terrace with parasols and sunbeds is ideal for those wishing to get a proper Tenerife suntan. Tennis enthusiats can make use of the complex's 2 tennis courts. There is also beach volley court and a children's playground. While the Snack / Pool Bar serves all sorts of light meals and snacks the indoor bar offers Satellite TV and Sports channels. Internet corner. Some facilities are payable locally. Cleaning 5 days x week. Change of towels 3 days x week. Change of linen 2 days x week.There is a TV room , reading lounge and the 7 isles corner, ideal for families and child to play. 0609 FG This is with traditional wooden balconies building. Complex of 4/5 floors and 6 lifts. Snack / Pool Bar serving all sorts of light meals and snacks It's unique typical Canarian balconies and nice garden area, is certainly the ideal complex for couples and families, as it offers very large and comfortable units, a friendly atmosphere. A really convenient location: quiet but at easy reach of beach and centre of resort Los Cristianos.

Guest Rooms - 146 units consisting of one bedroom apartments and some larger ones of 2 bedrooms and 3 bedrooms All units offer a friendly atmosphere and dispose of a living area, separate twin bedroom (s) , kitchenette with fridge and 2 rings, kettle, toaster , coffee machine, full bathroom, direct telephone, TV , safe for rent, terrace or balcony. This is with traditional wooden balconies building. Complex of 4/5 floors and 6 lifts. Snack / Pool Bar serving all sorts of light meals and snacks
